author: IGN
description:
Clevatess is now streaming on Crunchyroll.

One of the Lords of Dark Beasts, Clevatess’s reign shatters when he revives a hero he personally slayed and adopts an orphaned humanoid baby—the last hope to save a dying world. Now bound together, what fate awaits this unlikely trio?

#IGN #Anime
title: Clevatess - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description: Relive the four days of destiny. Check out the Fate/hollow ataraxia Remastered trailer for this adventure visual novel game. Fate/hollow ataraxia Remastered will be available on August 7, 2025.
title: Fate/hollow ataraxia Remastered - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
DAN DA DAN Season 2 is available now on Crunchyroll.

Momo is a high school girl born into a family of spirit mediums. Her classmate Okarun is an
occult fanatic. Encountering overwhelming and bizarre phenomena one after another,
Momo awakens her hidden powers and Okarun gains the power of a curse. They now set
out to help Momo’s childhood friend Jiji, who is tormented by ghosts, by heading over to his
home for exorcism… What will be the next bizarre phenomenon they face there!?

#IGN #Anime
title: DAN DA DAN Season 2 - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
BioShock 4 has been a long time coming, and it might be even longer. The game has reportedly failed an internal review at publisher 2K, prompting a leadership shake-up at developer Cloud Chamber Games. A rumored remake of the original BioShock has also reportedly been canceled. Over at Larian Studios, the developer is celebrating the second anniversary of Baldur's Gate 3, and is teasing their next project, which is not DnD related. And finally, Nintendo is re-committing to the 2025 release window for Metroid Prime 4: Beyond. The game will be playable at this year's Fan Expo in Canada.

#IGN #Gaming
title: BioShock 4 Undergoes 'Narrative Overhaul' After Failing Internal Review - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Season 5 story cinematic trailer ahead of the new season. Season 5 of Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 will be available on August 7, 2025. 

In Season 5 of Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, Adler, Marshall, and Woods are reinstated and joined by a familiar face. Time to find the last of the moles and dig them out.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Official Season 5 Story Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 20th Anniversary Trailer for The 40-Year-Old Virgin, the hit comedy film distributed by Universal Pictures. The 40-Year-Old Virgin is hitting theaters alongside a new 4K UHD and Blu-Ray release to celebrate the 20th anniversary of the film's release. The 4K UHD and Blu-Ray release is slated for August 12, with the film hitting theaters for one week only on August 22.

Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never "done the deed" only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.

The 40-Year-Old Virgin stars Steve Carell, Catherine Keener, Paul Rudd, Seth Rogen, Jane Lynch, Leslie Mann, and more. The film was directed by  Judd Apatow and produced by Judd Apatow, Clayton Townsend, and Shauna Robertson.

The 40-Year-Old Virgin is releasing on 4K UHD and Blu-Ray on August 12 and hits theaters on August 22.
title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin - Official 20th Anniversary Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Rafa Customization Options Trailer for Borderlands 4, the next installment in the hit first-person looter shooter franchise developed by Gearbox. Players can get the rundown on Rafa's customization options for players to make their Soldier class their own, with plenty of different colorways, helmets, and more. Play as Rafa in Borderlands 4, launching on September 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC.
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Rafa Customization Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the NERF Gameplay Trailer for Overwatch 2, the hit team-based hero shooter developed by Blizzard. Players can soon gain access to a suite of NERF weaponry to take into battle across Overwatch 2. Make use of Genji’s Slingerang + Power Blast Bat, Baptiste’s Loadout Galactic Commander, Hanzo’s Big Bad Bow, Mei’s Super Soaker XP100, Soldier: 76’s N Series Pinpoint, and Cassidy’s Maverick + Vortex Football and a new NERF Legendary Skin. A new limited-time game mode will also become available to earn more NERF themed rewards when the Overwatch 2 x NERF kicks off on August 5 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC
title: Overwatch 2 x NERF - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the 'Creating The Finale of Black Ops 6 Zombies' Intel Drop Video for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, the latest installment of the hit first-person shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. Players can hear straight from developers on what it was like to develop the epic conclusion to the Black Ops 6 Zombies experience with the arrival of Reckoning. Explore Janus Towers like never before with new elements to map, such as the use of parachutes to accommodate verticality alongside zero gravity areas to the map. Reckoning for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 is launching on August 7 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Official Zombies Finale Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at all the new stuff coming your way in the "Back to the Roots" Mega Patch 3 update for Chernobylite 2: Exclusion Zone, the post-apocalyptic first-person shooter/survival RPG. Check it out on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2075100/Chernobylite_2_Exclusion_Zone/

#IGN #Chernobylite2
title: Chernobylite 2: Exclusion Zone: Official "Back to the Roots" Mega Patch 3 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
We got to try the new fighting game set in the Invincible universe, Invinicible VS, at Evo 2025. Mitchell Saltzman and Will Borger talk through their thoughts from their time with the game right on the show floor.

Invincible VS combines tag fighter mechanics with the series' trademark brutality. You can form teams of three from characters such as Atom Eve, Omni-Man, Rex Splode, Battle Beast, and Invincible himself to lay the smack down on your opponent. Invincible VS is coming in 2026 to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Invincible VS Hands-On Impressions | EVO 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Ken Launch Trailer for Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves, the hit action fighting game developed by SNK. Players can step up to the ultimate fight as Ken from Street Fighter. Get a good look at this epic crossover as Ken takes on the mightiest of opponents in Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves. Ken is available now in Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves x Street Fighter - Official Ken Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In a town divided by duty and class, Vincent, a glassmaker’s son, and Alliz, a violinist who is the colonel’s daughter, fall in love. As their bond grows, rising tensions between their families threaten to pull them apart. Brought to life through stunning hand-drawn animation, The Glassworker is a poetic tale of first love, family, and the price of staying true to your art.

Winner of the Audience Award at the Asian World Film Festival and Pakistan’s official selection for Best International Feature at the 97th Academy Awards, director Usman Riaz’s acclaimed hand-drawn animated tale The Glassworker is coming to US cinemas on August 14, 2025.

The English dub voice cast includes Art Malik, Sacha Dhawan, and Anjli Mohindra.
title: The Glassworker Exclusive Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Battlefield 6 trailer for the FPS game to see what you can expect from the upcoming Open Beta. In the Battlefield 6 Open Beta, squad up, play new maps, new modes, and more. Battlefield 6's Open Beta begins this weekend, with early access starting August 7, 2025. Weekend 1 runs from August 9 to August 10, with Weekend 2 happening from August 14 to August 17.

Battlefield 6 will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam, EA App, Epic Games Store) on October 10, 2025.

#Battlefield6 #Beta #Gaming
title: Battlefield 6 - Official Open Beta Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Highest 2 Lowest trailer for the upcoming film starring Denzel Washington, Jeffrey Wright, Ilfenesh Hadera, and A$AP Rocky. From writer/director Spike Lee, Highest 2 Lowest is a reinterpretation of Akira Kurosawa’s crime thriller High and Low, now played out on the mean streets of modern day New York City.

When a titan music mogul (Denzel Washington), widely known as having the “best ears in the business”, is targeted with a ransom plot, he is jammed up in a life-or-death moral dilemma. 

Highest 2 Lowest opens in theaters on August 15, 2025, and will be available for streaming on Apple TV+ September 5, 2025.

#Highest2Lowest #Movies #IGN
title: Highest 2 Lowest - Official Trailer (2025) Denzel Washington, Jeffrey Wright, A$AP Rocky

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Dynasty Warriors 25th Anniversary trailer for a look back at the tactical action game series over the years. 

The 25th anniversary Dynasty Warriors trailer also gives a peek at what's coming, including the announcement that DLC for Dynasty Warriors Origins is in development, and a remaster of a classic Dynasty Warriors game is also under development.

#IGN #DynastyWarriors #25thAnniversary
title: Dynasty Warriors - Official 25th Anniversary Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Ken has arrived on the streets of South Town in Fatal Fury City of the Wolves! Learn how to pilot the Street Fighting world champ as he adapts to the system mechanics of Fatal Fury. 

You can play Ken right now in Fatal Fury City of the Wolves! 

Fatal Fury COTW is available on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), PC (Steam), and Xbox Series X|S.

#IGN #FatalFury #EVO2025
title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves - Official Ken Character Breakdown

author: IGN
description:
Neferpitou is coming to Hunter X Hunter Nen Impact as the first DLC character in Fall 2025! 

Announced at EVO 2025, Hunter X Hunter Nen Impact will be receiving a Season Pass that includes Neferpitou and 3 as of yet unnannounced characters! Keep it locked to IGN for more news as it becomes available! 

Hunter x Hunter Nen Impact is out now on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch and PC (Steam)

#IGN #HunterXHunter #EVO2025
title: HUNTERxHUNTER NENxIMPACT - Official Season Pass Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Ken Masters takes on Terry Bogard in this new animated trailer from renowned Japanese Animation Director: Masami Ōbari! 

You can play Ken right now in Fatal Fury City of the Wolves! 

Fatal Fury COTW is available on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), PC (Steam), and Xbox Series X|S.

#IGN #FatalFury #Evo2025
title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves - Official Fatal Fury x Street Fighter Animated Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Guilty Gear Strive 2.0 is coming! Starting in 2026 with Season 5, GG Strive will see a substantial update that promises to shake up the gameplay! 

While details are scarce, based on the previous seasons, you can expect to see new characters, new stages and big changes to gameplay! 

For more information, keep it locked to IGN.

#IGN #GuiltyGearStrive #Evo2025,
title: Guilty Gear Strive - Official Future Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest outfits for Luke, Jamie, Manon, Kimberly, A.K.I, Cammy and Chun-Li in Street Fighter 6! Outfit 4 is the long-awaited DLC outfit series for the world warriors, with this first phase featuring new costumes as well as outfits inspired by classic Street Fighter 2 artwork. 

You can grab these costumes on August 5th 2025! 

Street Fighter 6 is available for PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), PC (Steam), Nintendo Switch 2 and Xbox Series X|S.

#IGN #StreetFighter6 #EVO
title: Street Fighter 6 - Official Outfit 4 Showcase Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Armor King returns to the ring in this new Gameplay Trailer for TEKKEN 8! 

The armor-clad luchador makes his return in TEKKEN 8 Season 2 as the third DLC character. A returning fan-favourite, Armor King brings a more brutal take on King's wrestling moves, overwhelming opponents with powerful strikes and throws. 

Armor King comes to Tekken 8 on October 13th 2025, for all Character Pass holders and October 16th 2025 for individual purchase. Tekken 8 is available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S and PC (Steam).

#IGN #TEKKEN #ArmorKing
title: TEKKEN 8 - Official Armor King Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Akira takes on newcomer Stella in this brand new first look at the combat gameplay from RGG Studio's New Virtua Fighter Project! 

Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio (RGG Studio) developers of the beloved Like a Dragon (Yakuza) series and Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. were at Evo 2025 to share a first look of gameplay at their New Virtua Fighter Project, assumed to be Virtua Fighter 6. Details on this upcoming fighting game are scarce at the moment, but keep it locked to IGN for more hard-hitting news and reveals as they happen!

#IGN #VirtuaFighter #RGGStudio
title: New Virtua Fighter Project - Official Combat Gameplay First Look
